content.html: I’m not straight out leaving Twitter, but I did join Mastodon and I will find time to up my IndieWeb game. Reason? Musk took the fun out of Twitter. Writing here now feels like an endorsement of him and I never want to endorse him :/
content.value:
I’m not straight out leaving Twitter, but I did join Mastodon and I will find time to up my IndieWeb game.

Reason? Musk took the fun out of Twitter. Writing here now feels like an endorsement of him and I never want to endorse him :/
